name: Mission
overview: A superb arcade / adventure game where, equipped with a Casquo Laser combination, you have to pass through more than eighty rooms where you will discover different and increasingly powerful weapons without which you cannot progress. of your advance, also put on the combinations that you find because they will protect you against the enemies with the increasing powers. You still wonder why you must take all these risks and perhaps perish ... It is necessary because you must kill the MALOX agent who stole the MEGATRON bomb formula and you want to sell it to an enemy power. It's up to you to discover it while trying to avoid the multitude of traps that you will encounter on your journey.
